text: Click here for Research Associate Post Details BHU Recruitment 2017 – JRF & Project Asst Posts: Banaras Hindu University (BHU) has published a notification for the recruitment of Junior Research Fellow & Project Assistant vacancies in a Department of Science and Technology, New Delhi sponsored project entitled “Developing of bio-farming oriented rural livelihood agri-preneurship through conversion of floral wastes/ crop residue to wealth among SC/ ST farmers to promote eco-friendly rural villages in Eastern Uttar Pradesh” on temporary basis. Eligible candidates can apply in the prescribed application format within 21 days from the date of advt. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… BHU Vacancy Details: Total No of Posts: 03 Name of the Posts: 1. Junior research Fellow: 01 Post 2. Project Assistant: 02 Posts Age Limit: Candidates upper age limit should be 28 years for S.No-01, not exceeding 28 years for S.No-02. Age relaxation of 5 years is applicable to SC/ ST/ Physically Handicapped/ Female candidates. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess M.Sc (Ag.) in Plant Pathology or M.Sc in Microbiology/ Biotechnology/ Botany/ Biochemistry or any discipline of life sciences with 55% marks for S.No-01, B.Sc/ B.Sc (Ag) with 55% marks for S.No-02. Selection Process: Selection will be based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates can send their application on plain paper giving bio-data with photograph along with qualification, age proof, research experience, publications in relevant field, caste/ tribe certificate etc., supported by attested documents to the Prof. H. B. Singh, Principal Investigator (PI), DST project, P-07-632, Department of Mycology and Plant Pathology, Institute of Agricultural Sciences, Banaras Hindu University, Varanasi-221005 with 21 days from the date of advt. Important Dates: Last Date for Submission of Application: Within 21 days from the date of advt. For more details like emoluments & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Recruitment Advt BHU Recruitment 2017- Research Associate Posts: Banaras Hindu University (BHU) has issued a notification for the recruitment of Research Associate vacancies for the project entitled “Regulated platelet activation and its therapeutic implications” on temporary basis. Eligible candidates send their application in the prescribed format within 21 days from the date of advertisement. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below…. Total No of Posts: 01 Name of the Post: Research Associate Age limit: Candidates upper age limit should be 35 years. Age relaxation will be applicable 05 years for SC/ ST/ OBC/ female categories as per GOI rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Ph.D in Biochemistry/ Life Science with NET/ GATE. Selection Process: Selection will be based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates can send their application on plain paper along with complete bio-data, qualifications supported by attested documents should reach to the Department of Biochemistry, Institute of Medical Sciences, Banaras Hindu University (BHU), Varanasi-221005, India within 21 days from the date of advt. Important Dates: Last date of Submission of Application: Within 21 days from the date of advertisement.
